name: Super Skunk
description: A predominantly indica variety, Super Skunk takes its robust flowers from its parent strain Skunk #1. By backcrossing the legendary Skunk with Afghani genetics, Sensi Seeds created a strain with dense, thick buds that are known to be extremely pungent with a surprisingly sweet taste. This strain produces a bold relaxing effect over the body and is a great answer for increased stress and body pains.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Sleepy, Hungry, Euphoric, Stress, Pain, Depression, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Anxious
